And of course, congratulations to our nominees and especially to Jen Ryan who ultimately received the title of "Masonic Teacher of the Year" for 2020!

Commissioner Ghiloni will be retiring on July 1, 2020, after over 28 years with the City, where he has served as Economic Development Specialist, Director of Facilities, and DPW Commissioner. The Commissioner has played a role in almost every project that has taken place in Marlborough over the past three decades and has done so with ingenuity and dedication.

Thank you, and good luck!

I am so very fortunate to have been their teacher! I can tell you, there's no better feeling in the world than when you come in contact with some of your favorite students from all those years ago to see them blossomed into completely genuine and amazing young people. And it is no doubt that they still hold those great big smiles that stay in my memories to this day! Happy Graduation Kyle and Kayla, your "Miss Demos" is so stinkin' proud of you both!!
